Specimen Type: Whole blood, serum, plasma, bone marrow aspirate, amniotic fluid
Purpose: To detect Parvovirus B19 DNA by PCR for accurate and reliable diagnosis.
Container: EDTA or heparin tube for whole blood; sterile tubes for serum, plasma, bone marrow aspirate, or amniotic fluid
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument, calibrated thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with tips, biological safety cabinet, computer with analysis software
